comment: She was awesome!  I am terrible at math.  She broke it down so you could really understand.  I got a 98 in the class.
i loved her! very easy and very understandable! do the projects, homeworks, and practice tests and you will easily get an A! favorite math teacher thus far!

This class was GREAT! She goes super slow. I never had statistics before this and she makes it easy. I love her. Shes a little goofy but she tries to make every thing straight forward. She gives study guides with answers and easy weekly HW love her!
This class was SUPER easy! If you took statistics in high school, you're basically learning the same thing over again. Her tests and homework are an easy A!
Take her!! I was not looking forward to statistics and she makes it such an easy subject! Study guides before every test :)
Very Easy class you will fall asleep if your a math person.  If your not a math person she is the way to go.  She did not drop any grades over the summer but test follow notes to a T.

I heard a lot of horror stories about statistics prior to taking this class but she made it a breeze! She goes over exactly what will be on the tests before you take it, she doesn't take attendance (although I encourage it to take notes) and you do not need any book at all! Highly recommend.

3 tests (drop the lowest) plus final... easy A if you go to class and pay attention to the lectures... no need to do homework unless it doesn't come to you immediately... the groupwork is difficult but do-able!!
She made Stats a pretty painfree experience.  I was dreading this class so much, but she did a great job and I'm going to be earning my first A in a college math class this semester!!!!

She's okay. The groupwork is always hard, but the homework relates to the chapter. There's four tests and you can drop the lowest grade. Always lets out early or on time. Don't ask questions or she'll snap at you. She writes all notes on the board and posts them on her website too.
This is such an easy class if u just listen and do the groupwork...makes for an easy A. She is short tepmered so if u have aquestion ask her after class when she has time to explain.

This professor grades easy and is clear in her lectures but is not very professional or available for students. She gets peeved whenever someone asks a question. There is a lot of homework and groupwork..it is easy work, but a little time consuming.
